scenes.background: Monica glances at Bob, who is deep in thought.
scenes.description: We need to come up with a plan that suits everyone. Any ideas?

options.text: Why don't we list out everyone's strengths and assign tasks accordingly?
options.analysis: You focus on leveraging individual strengths, showing good emotional perception and empathy.

options.text: Let's just divide the work equally and get on with it.
options.analysis: You suggest an equal division of work, emphasizing efficiency, showing moderate self-regulation and motivation.

options.text: Maybe we should discuss our preferences first to avoid conflicts later.
options.analysis: You propose discussing preferences to avoid future issues, showing balanced emotional perception and social skills.
